name: AMT Longslide Hardballer
description: A brushed stainless steel .45 patterned after the Colt M1911 with a seven inch barrel.

name: APB Stechkin
description: The Russian, APB Stechkin, or Avtomaticheskij Pistolet Besshumnyj, is a Cold War era, double action, automatic machine pistol used by Spetsnaz special forces.

name: Strike One
description: Of Italian design, the Arsenal Firearms Strike One is a short recoil operated, hammerless striker-fired, semi-automatic pistol.

name: AutoMag
//: This weapon can easily change barrels due to its independent front sight (and vent ribs,) but since retool mods are IRREMOVABLE this cannot be accurately represented.
description: The AutoMag is easily recognizable because of a distinctive vented rib along its barrel.  It has a recoil operated, locking rotary bolt similar to many rifles, and is a highly regarded semi-automatic pistol.

name: Beretta 93R
//: Unable to include the integrated forward pistol-grip because it is a pistol.
description: The Beretta 93 Raffica machine pistol used by Italian counter-terrorism police and military forces.

name: Browning HP
description: The Browning Hi Power, introduced in 1935, has been a widely used military service sidearm for many countries.  It is a single action, recoil operated pistol.

name: Colt USMC M45A1 CQBP
description: The US Marine Corp standard-issue side arm, this single action, recoil operated, semi-automatic Close Quarter Battle Pistol is a M1911-style handgun with a sand-tan finish.

name: Coonan .357 Magnum Automatic
description: The Coonan Compensated .357 Magnum is a recoil operated, m1911-style automatic pistol of high quality.

name: H&K 45T
description: The Heckler & Koch 45 Tactical was intended to replace the Berreta M9 as the standard US Military service weapon in the Joint Combat Pistol program which was suspended due to budgetary contraints.  It is a double-action pistol, short-recoil operated, using modified Browning-type locking system and tilting barrel.

name: H&K 45CT
//: There's only a slight difference between this gun and the HK 45T.
description: The Heckler & Koch 45 Compact Tactical is a double-action pistol, short-recoil operated, using modified Browning-type locking system and tilting barrel.

name: Mare's Leg
description: The Henry Lever Action Mare's Leg has an octogon barrel with brass barrel bands and a brass receiver plate.  Classified as a pistol in the US, this is a cut-down version of a full sized rifle.

name: High Standard Semi-Automatic
description: A US Military, WWII era, target pistol for competition.

name: High Standard HDM
description: An OSS, US Special Operations Forces, and CIA pistol common between 1942-1951.  It is still found, today, in United States inventories.

name: High Standard Deluxe
description: A common .22 revolver loved for its dependability and comfortable grip.

name: Kahr K9
description: A popular concealed carry option for law enforcement officers, the Kahr K9 is a double action only, compact semi-automatic of solid steel construction with polymer grips.

name: Korth Nibelungen
description: Made with cold forged Damascus steel, the Korth Nibelungen is at the pinnacle of German precision engineering.
//: This hefty price tag is no typo.

name: Korth Combat
description: This wheelgun is hand crafted with German precision engineering.  The Korth Combat is a double action work of art machined from the finest billet steel.

name: Manurhin MR 73
description: A double-action revolver from France, the Manurhin MR 73 was a standard issue firearm for the French Police Nationale and Gendarmerie Nationale.  Its performance, durability, and accuracy have reached a legendary status.

//: It's a good weapon - for what it is.  But, in the zed-apoc and in the context of the game, it might not be the best choice of weapon to rely on because it's too weak to fire 9mm +P and +P+ without being damaged.  To reflect that, I reduced its durability.
name: Rohrbaugh R9s
description: The Rohrbaugh R9s is a hammerless, compact semi-automatic.  Lightweight, double action, it is operated with a short recoil and a locking breech.

name: S&W 59
description: The Smith & Wesson Model 59 double-action, semi-automatic pistol.

name: S&W 686
description: The stainless steel Smith & Wesson Model 686 double-action revolver is a popular sidearm among several US law enforcement agencies and police.

name: Vörös-Danuvia VD-01
//: This used to come in a pack containing an autofire kit, but the kit was removed from coregame.  Added burst 6 based on 1 second of automatic fire.  See https://github.com/CleverRaven/Cataclysm-DDA/pull/22534 .
description: A Hungarian weapon, the Vörös-Danuvia Machine-Pistol VD-01 features a distinctive under-barrel cylindrical magazine forward the trigger guard.
